onCancelAppointmentButtonClick() - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.AppointmentViewController
Method is called when pressing the cancel button in the GUI.
onDetailsButtonClick() - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.AppointmentViewController
Method to view appointment details in new Window The method gets the selected appointment out of the fxml table and stores it as an object to provide it to the scene switch function of the SceneController object

The method is called by selecting the MenuItem edit under the writer healthInformation.

onMakeAppointmentButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.MainPageController
Switch to make appointment, by calling method from SceneController
onOkButtonClick() - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.UpdateAppointmentController
Update the appointment in the DB, by the given values LocalDate date from the datePicker and Time as String
onPrintMenuClick() - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.MainPageController
The method is called by selecting the menuItem print under the writer HealthInformation.
onSpecificationMouseClick() - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.MakeAppointmentController
By clicking on an item in the specification list the selected value is set to the text field and all doctors with the similar specification are shown, by getting them out of the database.
onUpdateAppointmentButtonClick() - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.AppointmentViewController
Method is called by Change Time button click Method is used to update the date and time of the appointment by opening new window via the SceneController.
onViewAbout(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.MainPageController
The method is called by pressing the menuItem about under the Help writer.
onViewAppointmentButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.MainPageController
Switch to appointment view stage, by calling method from SceneController
onViewUserProfile(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.gui.ehealt_v2.MainPageController
The method is called by pressing the MenuItem viewProfile under the writer Profile.
openingHours - Variable in class UserManagement.Doctor
